DOC.brief_summary: A randomize control pilot study conduct evaluate effect acupuncture protocol treatment vulvodynia . Hypotheses : 1 . Acupuncture reduce vulvar pain dyspareunia woman vulvodynia . 2 . Acupuncture increase sexual function woman vulvodynia .
DOC.criteria: Previously diagnose either generalize vulvodynia , localize vestibulodynia , Provoked vulvodynia Unprovoked vulvodynia Women 18 year age menopause Pregnancy Menopause Interstitial cystitis Irritable bowel syndrome Untreated vaginitis Cervicitis Pelvic inflammatory disease Diagnosed pelvic pathology cause pain Concomitantly receive physical therapy Concomitantly receive biofeedback , Concomitantly receive massage Concomitantly receive additional acupuncture .
